definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
dealing with red tape/paperwork/(Tw) word processing

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一個新頁面都有與文書處理機相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: The slave might be your business manager, but all the slave could do is the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 就算他爲你管理生意，也只能做做文書工作。

sentences.english: A revision of that English book will be published in May this year.
sentences.chinese: 那本英文書的修訂版將於今年五月出版。

sentences.english: I can read the English book without a dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我可以不用詞典讀這本英文書。

sentences.english: Both documents challenge the notion of a dog-eat-dog society, where survival of the fittest reigns.
sentences.chinese: 兩份文書都對適者生存的弱肉強食社會觀念提出挑戰。

sentences.english: We have only a small percentage of foreign books.
sentences.chinese: 我們只有一少部分外文書。

sentences.english: I'm reading an English book now.
sentences.chinese: 我現在正看一本英文書。

sentences.english: The ancient books and articles in the tombs unearthed in Turpan have proved this historical fact.
sentences.chinese: 吐魯番出土的文書和隨葬品充分證明了這一歷史史實。

sentences.english: Nobody's status at the company should ever be unclear for a lack of appropriate paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 所有人在公司的位置都應由適當的文書明確。

sentences.english: Chinese translations shall be attached to the documents and forms done in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 外文書件應當附中文譯本。

sentences.english: An imperial edict is a writ in the name of an emperor.
sentences.chinese: 詔書是以皇帝名義發佈指令的專用文書。

sentences.english: The reform on making paper files into dossier provides opportunities to realize the modernization of the archives management.
sentences.chinese: 文書立卷改革爲實現檔案管理現代化提供了良好機遇。

sentences.english: So solving the standardization problems of making prison reward and punishment documents is the key to improving its writing levels and quality.
sentences.chinese: 是提高監獄獎懲文書製作的文字水平與質量的關鍵。

sentences.english: The economic documents of Dunhuang temples reflect the civil accounting thoughts during the period of Tang and Five Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌寺院經濟文書體現了唐五代時期的民間會計思想。

sentences.english: He especially loves reading English books.
sentences.chinese: 他特別喜愛閱讀英文書。

sentences.english: It was in a foreign language bookstore that I bought this book.
sentences.chinese: 我是在一家外文書店裏買到這本書的。

definition: to put down in writing/to take down notes/transcript/record
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
catalog/table of contents/directory (on computer hard drive)/list/contents
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
